segments.text: Have you been in America long , Hellen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Only for a couple of weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where are you going to study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to register at Harvard next month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you going to major in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to major in tourism . What about you ? How long have you been here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . You should be able to give me some advice on where to stay . At the moment , I am staying in a hotel which is far away from the school .
segments.speaker: S2
